resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108157</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108157</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205518</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Occupational Health and Safety Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berufliche Gesundheit und Sicherheitsquiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercice de la sécurité de salubrité 
professionnelle et</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz de saúde ocupacional e de segurança</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz di sanità e sicurezza professionale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων υγιεινής και ασφάλειας της 
εργασίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Concurso de la medicina del trabajo y de seguridad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Quiz with 47 true/false questions about occupational health and safety. The quiz can be used on its own, or could be expanded into part of a larger training module.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Befragen Sie mit 47 true/false Fragen über 
berufliche Gesundheit und Sicherheit. Der Quiz kann 
eigenständig verwendet werden oder könnte in Teil eines größeren 
Trainings-Abschnitts erweitert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Questionnez avec 47 questions de true/false au 
sujet de la salubrité professionnelle et de la sûreté. Le jeu
peut être utilisé seule, ou pourrait être augmenté dans une partie
d'un plus grand module de formation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz com 47 perguntas de true/false sobre a saúde 
ocupacional e a segurança. O quiz pode ser usado no seus 
próprios, ou poderia ser expandido na peça de um módulo de 
treinamento maior.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz con 47 domande di true/false circa 
professionale sanità e sicurezza. Il quiz può essere usato da 
sè, o potrebbe essere espanso nella parte di più grande modulo di 
addestramento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων με 47 αληθινές/ψεύτικες 
ερωτήσεις για την υγιεινή και την ασφάλεια της εργασίας. Ο 
διαγωνισμός γνώσεων μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί από μόνος του, ή 
θα μπορούσε να επεκταθεί σε μέρος μιας μεγαλύτερης ενότητας 
κατάρτισης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Quiz con 47 preguntas de true/false sobre medicina 
del trabajo y seguridad. El concurso se puede utilizar en sus el
propios, o se podría ampliar en pieza de un módulo de entrenamiento 
más grande.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Negocio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JOE KERR
FN:JOE KERR
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205518</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108157</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/occupational-health-and-safety-quiz</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
